item.title: 密苏里州回绝 NFL 酋长队后，堪萨斯州急于吸引 NFL 酋长队
item.description: 堪萨斯州州长劳拉-凯利（Laura Kelly）签署了一项法案，旨在吸引全国橄榄球联盟的堪萨斯城酋长队（Kansas City Chiefs）或美国职业棒球大联盟的堪萨斯城皇家队（Kansas City Royals）从密苏里州跨州搬迁。【原文：Kansas Governor Laura Kelly signed a bill intended to entice the National Football League’s Kansas City Chiefs or Major League Baseball’s Kansas City Royals to move across state lines from Missouri.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：这对美联储来说很棘手
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看每周一期的《奇货》时事通讯，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣的发展的看法。特蕾西本周五去远足了，所以只有乔。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy. Tracy is away on a hiking trip this Friday, so it’s just Joe.】

item.title: 日元暴跌，美元连胜延续至第五周
item.description: 由于美联储首次降息的时机仍不明朗，衡量美元强弱的一个关键指标将连胜势头延续到第五周。【原文：A key gauge of dollar strength is extending its winning streak into a fifth week as the timing for the Federal Reserve’s first interest rate cut remains cloudy.】

item.title: 基金回补看跌押注，钯金飙升至一个月高点
item.description: 钯金飙升至一个月以来的最高点，原因是汽车制造商的补货活动导致交易商买回看跌押注。【原文：Palladium surged to the highest in a month as traders bought back their bearish bets amid restocking activity by automakers.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉将加入全球监察机构的黑钱 "灰名单
item.description: 已经受到美国制裁的委内瑞拉预计将被列入全球监督机构的 "灰名单"，因为它在阻止非法资金流动方面没有取得足够的进展。【原文：Venezuela, already under sanctions from the US, is expected to get added to a global watchdog’s “gray list” for not making sufficient progress to stem illicit financial flows.】

item.title: 市场利润暴跌 50%，花旗集团和瑞银退出债券市场
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. 和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG））等华尔街大公司纷纷撤资，导致承销加价率在长达二十年之久的下降后触底反弹，在 4 万亿美元的市政债券市场上赚钱比以往任何时候都难。【原文：Making money in the $4 trillion municipal bond market is harder than ever after a two-decade long drop in underwriting markups pinched bottom lines, contributing to pullback by major Wall Street firms such as Citigroup Inc. and UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 法国相对德国的风险溢价创 2012 年以来新高
item.description: 投资者要求持有的法国债券与更安全的德国债务相比，获得十多年来最大的溢价，因为人们越来越担心，在法国即将举行的立法选举中获胜的政党可能会进一步膨胀公共财政。【原文：Investors are demanding the biggest premium in over a decade to hold French bonds compared to safer German debt, as concerns mount that parties vying to win France’s upcoming legislative elections may further bloat public finances.】

item.title: 洛杉矶立法者誓言为 Calpers 和 Calstrs 的石油争夺战投入 150 亿美元新资金
item.description: 一项迫使美国两大养老基金剥离约 150 亿美元石油和天然气资产的加州法案已连续第三年悄然失败，但该法案背后颇具影响力的州立法者誓言要与气候活动家结成更强大的联盟，重新启动这项立法。【原文：A California bill forcing the two largest US pension funds to divest an estimated $15 billion in oil and gas assets has quietly fizzled for the third straight year, but the influential state lawmaker behind the effort vowed to renew the legislation with a stronger alliance of climate activists.】

item.title: Fiera Management 收购投资者股份，巩固控制权
item.description: Fiera Capital Corp. 的创始人及其高级经理巩固了他们对这家加拿大资产管理公司的控制，达成了一项协议，收购了一家希望退出其控股的顶级投资者。【原文：Fiera Capital Corp.’s founder and his top managers solidified their control over the Canadian asset manager, striking a deal to buy out a top investor that was looking to exit its holding.】

item.title: 加纳达成 130 亿美元欧洲债券重组协议
item.description: 加纳及其欧元债券投资者已就重组约 130 亿美元的美元债券达成原则性协议，这标志着自一年多前这个西非国家开始债务重组以来迈出的重要一步。【原文：Ghana and its eurobond investors have reached an agreement in principle to restructure about $13 billion of dollar bonds, marking a major step since the West African nation embarked a debt overhaul over a year ago.】

item.title: 英国塔塔钢铁公司工人就裁员计划举行无限期罢工
item.description: 英国塔塔钢铁有限公司正面临着一场历史性的罢工，一些工人计划举行该公司 40 年来首次罢工，抗议其削减数千个工作岗位的计划。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd. is facing an historic strike in the UK as some workers plan the company’s first walkout in the country in 40 years over its plan to cut thousands of jobs.】

item.title: 私人飞机和游艇降落在南塔基特岛，参加杰富瑞收购活动
item.description: 超级游艇 "Night Howl "号，全长 164 英尺，驶入南塔基特港。【原文：The superyacht Night Howl, all 164 lustrous feet of it, pulled into Nantucket harbor.】

item.title: 欧拉电动汽车在 IPO 估值问题上面临投资者的反击
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的电动滑板车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 正面临投资者对其即将进行的首次公开募股目标估值的反对。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd., India’s largest electric scooter maker, is facing investor pushback on its targeted valuation for its upcoming initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于估值低廉，外国企业对英国公司的兴趣达到 2021 年的高点
item.description: 由于低廉的估值刺激了对伦敦上市公司的兴趣，外国公司对英国公司的投标价值将达到 2021 年以来最高的六个月。【原文：The value of foreign bids for UK companies is headed for the highest six-month tally since 2021 as cheap valuations fuel appetite for London-listed firms.】

item.title: 埃弗顿与罗马俱乐部老板弗里德金进行独家出售谈判
item.description: 埃弗顿给了罗马俱乐部老板丹-弗里德金（Dan Friedkin）一段独家收购英超足球俱乐部多数股权的时间。【原文：Everton has given AS Roma owner Dan Friedkin a period of exclusivity to acquire a majority shareholding in the Premier League football club.】

item.title: 瑞银据称将辞退巴西企业的 10 名投资银行家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）与国营银行巴西银行（Banco do Brasil SA）在南美的合资公司瑞银巴西投资银行（UBS BB Investment Bank）在整合来自瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）的团队时，已解雇了巴西的约 10 名员工。【原文：UBS BB Investment Bank, the joint venture between UBS Group AG and state-run lender Banco do Brasil SA in South America, has dismissed about 10 employees in Brazil as it integrates teams from Credit Suisse, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国对外直接投资连续 12 个月下降
item.description: 衡量外国对华直接投资的一项指标连续第12个月下降，凸显出中国政府在努力提高对海外投资者的吸引力以促进经济增长。【原文：A measure of foreign direct investment in China declined for the 12th straight month, underscoring Beijing’s struggle to improve its appeal to overseas investors to boost growth.】

item.title: 高等级公司债券交易日益接近垃圾级水平
item.description: 一些购买垃圾债券的基金经理已经将资金投入投资级债券，因为现在的收益率几乎一样高。【原文：Some money managers that buy junk bonds have been pouring money into investment-grade notes instead, because the yields can be almost as high now.】

item.title: 金砖国家如何变得不仅仅是一个口号
item.description: 由新兴市场国家组成的金砖国家集团（BRICS）已从二十年前一家投资银行的口号变成了一个控制着多边贷款机构的现实世界俱乐部。到2024年，它的规模将扩大一倍，使几个主要的能源生产国与发展中国家中一些最大的消费国结成对子，并有可能增强该集团在美国主导的世界中的经济影响力。【原文：The BRICS group of emerging-market nations — the acronym stands for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa — has gone from a slogan dreamed up at an investment bank two decades ago to a real-world club that controls a multilateral lender. It doubled in size in 2024, pairing several major energy producers with some of the biggest consumers among developing countries and potentially enhancing the group’s economic clout in a US-dominated world.】

item.title: 想象一下，如果伦敦成功阻止了俄罗斯油轮的运输：石油战略
item.description: 一艘原油油轮因属于运送俄罗斯石油的所谓 "影子船队 "而受到英国政府的制裁，现已在波罗的海闲置了一个多星期。【原文：A crude tanker has now been sitting idle in the Baltic Sea for over a week since it was sanctioned by the British government for being part of a so-called shadow fleet moving Russian petroleum.】

item.title: 孟加拉国与印度讨论河流项目，中国迫在眉睫
item.description: 孟加拉国总理谢赫-哈西娜（Sheikh Hasina）周五开始对新德里进行为期两天的双边访问，达卡希望在竞争日益激烈的中国和印度之间平衡关系。【原文：Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina began a two-day bilateral visit to New Delhi on Friday, as Dhaka aims to balance ties between an increasingly competitive China and India.】

item.title: 象牙海岸准备对埃尼公司的潜在出售行使优先权
item.description: 据熟知内情的官员透露，如果埃尼公司（Eni SpA）决定出售其在象牙海岸的勘探业务股份，象牙海岸有望成为首选。【原文：Ivory Coast expects to be first in line should Eni SpA decide to sell a stake in its exploration business there, according to officials familiar with the information.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司和 EnBW 赢得德国海上风电高价拍卖会
item.description: 石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）和巴登符腾堡州电力公司（EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG）在德国海上风电拍卖中胜出，为政府带来了 30 亿欧元（32 亿美元）的收益。【原文：Oil major TotalEnergies SE and utility EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG were winners in a German offshore wind auction that raked in €3 billion ($3.2 billion) for the government.】

item.title: 风险偏好下降，比特币跌至一个多月低点
item.description: 在缺乏新的市场催化剂的情况下，比特币跌至一个多月低点，今年破纪录的涨势显示出疲态。【原文：Bitcoin slumped to a more than one-month low with this year’s record-breaking rally showing signs of fatigue in the absence of fresh market catalysts.】

item.title: 运通卡购买软件帮助解决晚餐预订难问题
item.description: 美国运通公司同意以 4 亿美元的价格从 Squarespace 公司收购 Tock，增加了一项帮助客户在独家场所预订餐饮和其他难以获得的预订的服务。【原文：American Express Co. agreed to acquire Tock for $400 million from Squarespace Inc., adding a service that helps customers book dining and other hard-to-get reservations at exclusive venues.】

item.title: 每年 1 万美元的房屋保险显示加州购房者的痛苦
item.description: 加利福尼亚州高昂的房价和稀缺的库存已经成为美国最可怕的房地产市场之一。现在，在这个野火频发的州，获得和负担房屋保险的挑战使情况变得更加糟糕。【原文：California’s lofty home prices and scarce inventory already amounted to one of the most nightmarish housing markets in the US. Now, challenges securing and affording home insurance in the wildfire-prone state are making it even worse.】

item.title: 改革压制尼日利亚平行市场，奈拉数月来最平静
item.description: 由于 1 月份的货币贬值和其他改革措施有助于减少美元平行市场的作用，尼日利亚的货币正在延长其相对稳定的阶段。【原文：Nigeria’s currency is extending its phase of relative stability as a devaluation in January and other reforms help to reduce the role of the parallel market for dollars.】

item.title: 比亚迪与 Hub Power 合作在巴基斯坦销售电动汽车
item.description: 中国比亚迪汽车有限公司在一份交易所文件中表示，该公司计划与Hub Power公司的一个部门合作进入巴基斯坦，在该国销售电动汽车。【原文：China’s BYD Auto Co. plans to enter Pakistan in partnership with a unit of Hub Power Co. to sell electric vehicles in the country, it said in an exchange filing.】
